attributes.action: For the British Government to reinstate the importance of Global Ceasefire Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British and Costa Rican Governments proposed that the UN International Day of Peace  be changed to Global Ceasfire Day.  Unfortunately the British Government has since shown little or no awareness of the significance of the Day.   The British Government should reinstate the importance of this day and it should be observed by all practical means.    Where British troops are engaged in military conflict, they should work in conjunction with the UN to bring about a ceassation of hostilities for the day of September 21st
